title: Habib eSports Trials
body:
Habib eSports Trials (HBE) announces trials for our new and upcoming team. Habib eSports is aiming high with equal expectations, focusing on becoming a frontline in the Oceanic region. This is the beginning of a long commitment and successful players will demonstrate commitment, synergy, sportsmanship, teamwork and the willingness to improve and practice. 

We are beginning trials of players at a solo queue level of diamond 2 and above in the current season. If you were d2 or above in season 4, but aren't quite there yet this season, we encourage you to continue climbing the ladder and contact us when you reach the required level. 
For communication purposes players are required to have a mic and be able to use Teamspeak or Skype
If you fit the requirements and are serious about trials, contact either of the below contacts.

Owner: IGN: HBE Hamko  
 Skype: seever619

Manager: IGN: HBE AzzMaster7  
Skype: AzzMaster7

Please leave your: 
:IGN:
:Skype:
:Age:
:Main Role:
:Why you should be on the team:

And remember this is a LONG commitment.

replies.body: how long will trials be commenced (as in a closed date) and also does this team have a gaming house or are looking to get one anytime soon as a very serious player i am looking for a team after my hsc
